pageProps.title: The Dark Side of Being a Software Engineer: Health, Work Culture, and Peer Pressure
pageProps.metaDesc:
Software engineering is often considered a dream job, with high salaries, opportunities for growth and recognition, and a constantly evolving industry. However, as with any profession, there are also dark sides to working in the software development industry.
In this article, we will explore the three main negative aspects of being a software engineer: health issues, work culture, and peer pressure.
